languages.text: "Знавала я одного командира, предпочитающего быстрые, простые и эффективные меры. Жаль, не выжил".
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."
languages.original_text: "Знавала я одного командира, предпочитающего быстрые, простые и эффективные меры. Жаль, не выжил".

traits.locale_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive — no, he did not."
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive — no, he did not."
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive — no, he did not."
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."
"I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

languages.text: "Ich kannte einmal einen Kommandanten, der schnelle, simple und effektive Maßnahmen bevorzugt hat. Zu schade, dass er nicht überlebt hat."
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kannte mal einen Kommandanten, der schnelle, simple und effektive Maßnahmen bevorzugt hat. Zu schade, dass er nicht überlebt hat. Nein, das hat er nicht."

languages.text: « J'ai connu un commandant qui préférait les mesures rapides, simples et efficaces. Dommage qu'il n'ait pas survécu... »
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai connu un commandant qui préférait les mesures rapides, simples et efficaces. Dommage qu'il n'ait pas survécu... Vraiment dommage. »

languages.text: «Conocí a un comandante que prefería medidas rápidas, simples y efectivas. Es una lástima que no sobreviviera».
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

traits.locale_text: «Conocí a un comandante que prefería medidas rápidas, simples y efectivas. Es una lástima que no sobreviviera... Y no lo hizo».

languages.text: 「素早く単純で、効果的な手段を好む指揮官を知っていた。彼が生き残れなかったのは残念ね」
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

traits.locale_text: 「素早く単純で、効果的な手段を好む指揮官を知っていた。彼が生き残れなかったのは残念ね」

languages.text: “我认识个指挥官，他喜欢采取简单、快速、有效的措施，但可惜的是，他死了。”
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

traits.locale_text: “我认识个指挥官，他喜欢采取简单、快速、有效的措施，但很可惜他死了。是啊，他死了。”

languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."

languages.text: "Hızlı, basit ve etkili yöntemleri tercih eden bir komutan tanımıştım. Hayatta kalmaması yazık oldu."
languages.original_text: "I knew a commander who preferred quick, simple, and effective measures. A shame he didn't survive."
